title: Launch Audio Feed - Confirm Appearance
custom_preconds: Feed Select for a live game is open and at least one Audio Feed is available.
custom_steps: When any Audio feed is activated
custom_expected:
Then feed launches as expected
AND audio plays as expected,
AND Game Data/Innings appear current and as expected 
AND background matching game's current venue is shown. ***Game running time is shown but only shows time counting up from user launch, may be removed in the future rather than fixed.

title: Feed Playback
custom_preconds: Given the Audio feed has been successfully launched and is playing back expected audio.
custom_expected: THEN Audio plays back as expected to end of game. ----- Should also jump out to Games View but this is not likely to be fixed any time soon https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/WOLF-589 Can PASS this case if you get a full game of audio playback.

title: Exit at Playback
custom_preconds: Given the Audio feed has been successfully launched and is playing back expected audio.
custom_steps: WHEN the user activates the menu to exit
custom_expected: THEN the app returns to the Scores view

title: Game data updates
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a game is Live (or simulated in QA via Stringer and Audio Feed Media_On)
AND we have launched the Audio Player
custom_steps: WHEN we observe the Bases, B/S/O and score during game play AND we continue to observe for a minimum of 10 minutes
custom_expected: THEN we will see the expected updates to the data in real time AND everything will appear as expected __Note: Ideally this can be checked in tandem with playback testing__

title: Screensaver during playback
custom_preconds:
Given The App launched 
AND the user is logged in with entitled account
AND tvOS Screensaver timer is set to 2 minutes with Show During Music set to Yes
AND Live game available
custom_steps:
WHEN the Audio Player is launched
AND the users waits for Screensaver to appear (Let play for >1 minute Activate tvOS remote Menu Button)
custom_expected:
THEN the Audio continues to play while Screensaver is active 
AND User can return to Audio Player view by activating Menu

title: Sleep
custom_steps:
WHEN Audio Player is launched 
AND Playback is allowed to run for > 15 min
custom_expected: THEN Sleep does not interrupt audio playback
